target_validation.rationale: Target validated for Nipah virus infection

key_uncertainties: In silico predictions require in vitro confirmation

pk_uncertainties: Allometric scaling from in silico predictions

designations.rationale: Nipah virus infection is PRV-qualifying tropical disease
Nipah virus infection affects <200,000 US patients

ip_mitigations: Conduct comprehensive FTO analysis before IND

patient_population.recruitment_considerations: Adults and children in endemic regions

executive_summary.investment_thesis: Novel compound targeting Nipah virus infection with favorable safety profile. PRV-eligible indication with estimated 00M+ voucher value. Recommended for IND-enabling studies.
